ValidationRule.description: If the value provided within the "Does Install Involve RO4W?" field = Yes, you must provide a value within RO4W 1. If the value = No, then RO4W 1, 2, & 3 values must be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Does_Install_Involve_RO4W__c, 'YES') , ISBLANK( FS_RO4W1__c )) , true, false), AND(ISPICKVAL( Does_Install_Involve_RO4W__c , 'NO'), OR(NOT(ISBLANK(FS_RO4W1__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(FS_RO4W2__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(FS_RO4W3__c))))) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, $Label.Exclude_User))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the value provided within the "Does Install Involve RO4W?" field = Yes, you must provide a value within RO4W 1. If the value = No, then RO4W 1, 2, & 3 values must be blank.
